overview: Following the balls-bustin’ success of ABDUCTED & DEGRADED, we had only one demand: a sequel! And this is it – another mind-blowing session of pissing, fisting, torture, double-penetration and pretty much every other depravity you can dream of. Those boys from Prague sure weren’t happy – as you’ll see from the agony of their faces – but we know you vanilla-haters won’t give a fuck, as red-raw asses and splattered faces once again become very much the order of the day!
title: Busted And Abused
